abstract: When Ben Lowy was in Afghanistan taking pictures for our story "The Bad Guys vs. the Worse Guys," he did so using both his digital camera, to make traditional 35-millimeter photos, and the Hipstamatic app on his iPhone.
snippet: When Ben Lowy was in Afghanistan taking pictures for our story "The Bad Guys vs. the Worse Guys," he did so using both his digital camera, to make traditional 35-millimeter photos, and the Hipstamatic app on his iPhone.
